ðŸ“– Summary: Gitnuro is a free and open-source, multiplatform Git client built with Jetbrains Compose and JGit. It aims to provide a constraint-free Git client, not relying on web technologies, with features for both beginners and advanced users, including diff viewing, history browsing, staging, committing, branching, merging, and more.
